HomeView.subtitle: Here are a few things to help you get started...
HomeView.big_card_body:
Welcome to VBS, Search and add books to your library to enjoy personalized recommendations for your reading!
Discover new authors or new sagas thanks to the author, title or genre searches!
To begin with I advise you to have a look at the best sellers ;)

card_1.title: Fiction
card_1.subtitle: Want to escape to another world?

card_2.title: Romance
card_2.subtitle: Want to travel to the land of love?

BibView.no_books: You have not yet added any books to your library.
BibView.search_to_add: Search for them to add them.

SouhaitsView.no_books: You have not yet added any books to your wishlist.
SouhaitsView.search_to_add: Search for them to add them.

RecommendationView.refresh_page: Reload the page to have more.

AboutView.title: About VBS
AboutView.licence: VBS is an open-source application licensed under the GNU GPLv3.
AboutView.find_source_code: You can find the source code of VBS on Github
AboutView.report_bug: Report a problem, request a feature
AboutView.report_bug_text: Although VBS is stable overall, bugs may still appear. Feel free to report them, or to ask for features you would like to see using the issue tracker

0_3_1.ul:
• The dark mode switch keep the right state even after reloading.
  • Ajout du logo

0_3.ul:
• Implementing the composition api of vuejs.
  • added button to toggle the sidebar.
  • Added category selector for search.
  • Added support for the english language.

0_2_5.ul: • Added skeleton-loader when loading books in the search and recommendations.

0_2_3.ul:
• Added floating button to return to the top of the page.
  • Add a placeholder when the google note is not available.
  • Added notifications when adding and removing books to the library / wishlist.
